mapper.insert: insert into teacher(tc_id, tc_pw, tc_name, tc_dob, tc_phone, tc_email, tc_picname, tc_savedpicid) values(#{tc_id}, #{tc_pw}, #{tc_name}, #{tc_dob}, #{tc_phone}, #{tc_email}, #{tc_picname}, #{tc_savedpicid})

insert into student(st_id, st_pw, st_name, st_dob, st_phone, st_email, st_level, st_picname, st_savedpicname) values(#{st_id}, #{st_pw}, #{st_name}, #{st_dob}, #{st_phone}, #{st_email}, #{st_level}, #{st_picname}, #{st_savedpicname})
mapper.select: select tc_id from teacher where tc_id=#{tc_id}
select st_id from student where st_id=#{st_id}
